snippet: Retired players deserve the chance to prove in court the link between the violent professional game and head trauma and that the league failed to protect them.
abstract: Editorial urges Federal Judge Anita Brody to allow the more than 200 cases filed against National Football League by retired players to proceed; contends players deserve chance to prove in court the link between violent game and head trauma and that the league failed to protect them.
lead_paragraph: Retired players deserve the chance to prove in court the link between the violent professional game and head trauma and that the league failed to protect them.

headline.seo: Brain Disease and the N.F.L. Go to Court
